job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pstrongPositionnbspstrongMid to senior level software engineerppstrongnbspstrongppstrongWho We ArestrongppMLJ Environmental is a small consulting firm located in Davis California that develops customized software solutions for its clientsnbspWe have over 25 years of experience protecting the prosperity of communities and their natural resourcesnbspWe simplify regulatory compliance with innovative approaches to science and data MLJ Environmental is seeking a mid to senior level software developer to join our teamnbspOur staff are bright innovative individuals who are interested in taking on new challenges within their careers The successful candidate should be comfortable in all aspects of software development nbspThis person should be comfortable working both independently and in a small groupnbspWe are seeking an individual willing to learn be flexible and creative We are a dog friendly officeppstrongnbspstrongppstrongSchedule and SalarystrongppThis is an exempt full time position with 40 hours a weeknbspThe salary will be based on experience and competitive within the industry and local marketnbspFull time employment benefits include health vision dental and life insurance Other benefits include vacation paid holidays sick leave and a 401K planppstrongnbspstrongppstrongExample of DutiesstrongppemEssential functions may include but are not limited to the followingempulliDevelop Microsoft ASPNET MVC web applications using CliliUse Visual studio for application developmentliliDetermine solutions to technical hurdles that may arise during the design testing and maintenance processliliCollaborate with testing team design team and implementation team using various diagrams flow charts and models to assist with internal communicationliliIdentify and address performance concerns including fixing bugs andor addressing client concernsliliEnsure that projects meet client deadlinesliliDocument aspects of the systemproject for future upgrades and maintenanceliliOther duties as assignedliulpnbspppstrongQualificationsstrongpulliCompleted a bachelors degree in Computer ScienceComputer EngineeringCISMIS or a related fieldliliMinimum of 3 years of experience within software development liulpstrongSkillsstrongpulliWell versed in HTML5 CSS SASS Javascript JSON and JqueryliliSome knowledge of relational databases SQL MySQL MSSQLliliExposure to cloud technologies Amazon Web ServicesAWS liliAttention to detail and organization to be able towork on various parts of a system or application while being accurate and thoroughliliThe ability to adapt and work on multiple different projects in the same day liliThe ability to work in a collaborative environment and communicate Examples include team white board sessions storyboarding design concepts and fleshing out pros and cons of various design options liulpTo apply please send a 1 cover letter 2 resume and 3 contact information for three references to Trisha Turner at tturnermljenvironmentalcom Please include in the subject line Software Engineer Application and reference in the email where you heard about this position in the emailnbspApplications missing any of the above may not be considered for this position nbspnbspNo phone calls pleasenbspAdditional information regarding MLJ can be found on our website at wwwmljenvironmentalcomppbrp
